attributes.action: Lower the Drink-Drive limit to 15mg/100ml (Current level - 35mg/100ml)
attributes.additional_details:
An average of 3,000 people a year die on the UK's road as a result of Drink-Drivers.

That is nearly 1-in-6 of all road deaths.

The current Drink-Drive limit in the UK is 35 Micrograms of alcohol to 100 Milliitres of breath.

This is still more then enough to incapacitate some people whom will get off with drink-driving as they may be under this limit and still be affected by the effect of the alcohol.

Please sign this petition to show your support to get the government to half this at least, to 15MG/100ML or less if possible.

Thank you.
